title: MEXICAN MACARONI SALAD
directions: Cook the pasta al dente. Rinse with cold water to stop them from cooking. In a large bowl combine all the ingredients for the salad together. Donâ€™t toss yet.
Whisk all the dressing ingredients together until smooth. Pour over the pasta ingredients and toss gently until everything is combined.
ingredients: 1 lbs of Macaroni, cooked, drained and quickly rinsed with cold water
1 cup of frozen (thawed) corn (or 2 ears of fresh corn)
1 can (15oz) black beans, drained and rinsed
1/2 cup Cheddar or Pepperjack Cheese, grated (optional)
